# Contributing to "Statistical Tools for Causal Inference"

In order to get SKY up and running on your computer, you have to install:

* [R](https://cran.r-project.org/mirrors.html)
* [Rstudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)
* [Latex](https://www.latex-project.org/get/#tex-distributions) Only if you want to generate pdfs.
If you have no Latex suite on your compputer and do not knwo how to install one, the recommended procedure is tu use the [tinytex package](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/installation.html) on R.
